H0.text: In1918 women over what age were given the right to vote. 21

H1.text: In1918 women over what age were given the right to vote. 25

H2.text: In1918 women over what age were given the right to vote. 28

H3.text: In1918 women over what age were given the right to vote. 30

A4.text: Women over 30 years old received the vote if they were registered property occupiers (or married to a registered property occupier) of land or premises with a rateable value greater than Â£5 or of a dwelling-house and not subject to any legal incapacity, or were graduates voting in a university constituency.

A5.text: The age of 30 was chosen because it was all that was politically possible at the time.
